addr: Station Road London, Gt Lon E4 7EN GB
title: Art for All: Poet Tree (Adult workshop)
desc: As others prepare to decorate trees with baubles and lights, come and discover the power of poetry and help us to dress a tree with words! Part of a monthly programme exploring different art forms with professional artists, where adults of all levels are welcome. Please note:  If you can no longer attend, please cancel your ticket and?free up the space for another person. Check your confirmation email for instructions or  click here If this event sells out, you can add yourself to the waitlist and you will be contacted if a space becomes available.
